title: card1 in the 2021 Cloud Report GCP Azure1
content: Our intention is to help our customers and any builder of OLTP applications understand the performance tradeoffs present within each cloud and within each cloud’s individual machines. Perhaps your current configuration isn’t the most cost effective
author: Hassen KaraaJan1
